description: Official website of Matthew Raynor — artist, developer, and storyteller. Explore his journey, portfolio, shop, and more.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of real-world projects I’ve built—from logistics systems to creative campaign sites.

projects.title: EJ Art Moving App
projects.description: A sleek logistics dashboard for managing clients, work orders, and invoices.

projects.title: Matt’s Freedom Fundraiser
projects.description: A donation-based campaign platform with embedded video, blog, and outreach.

projects.title: MatthewRaynor.com
projects.description: My flagship website combining my story, blog, art store, and technical portfolio.

projects.title: Matt’s Bookstore API
projects.description: A Django REST API bookstore project with Google SSO, reviews, and deployment.

projects.title: AI Motivational Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered real-time chat interface built to uplift, motivate, and support users.

projects.title: Lotus Path Learning Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered learning platform offering custom tutorials, quizzes, and progress tracking.

products.name: Before Me After Me – A Visual Journey of Resilience and Transformation
products.description: A powerful visual memoir following Matthew Raynor’s journey from life as a commercial fisherman to a life-altering diving accident that left him paralyzed.

products.name: 10 x 20 Headless Porgy
products.description: Premium aluminum print featured at Craig & Peter's.

products.name: 11 x 17 Church
products.description: Premium aluminum print featured at Craig & Peter's.

chatbot.greeting: Hi there! I'm here to help you explore Matthew Raynor's journey, portfolio, and shop. How can I assist you today?
chatbot.fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please rephrase your question or try a different query?
